title: Buy Tadej Pogačar’s Colnago V4Rs & Y1Rs in World Champion Livery
content:
Colnago and the UCI are bringing the rainbow stripes to the masses. Tadej Pogačar’s Colnago V4Rs and Y1Rs are now available to the public. Both bikes arrived decked out in Pogačar’s UCI World Champion colorway.

Pogačar’s Colnago Setup

Pogačar’s Worlds-winning setup is coming straight from the pro peloton to the shop floor. The Colnago V4Rs WC24 sports a white base punctuated by UCI rainbow stripes across the fork, top tube, and seat tube. What makes this colorway pop is the Colnago Ace of Clubs logo, blending the brand’s heritage with the prestige of the rainbow jersey. Maybe this is why Ritchey had to drop their Rainbows?

Over on the aero side, the Colnago Y1Rs carries a similar theme, with rainbow stripes on the top tube and fork, plus that vintage Colnago logo up front. This speed machine will be available in UAE Team Emirates-XRG in full white color options.

“We are incredibly proud of Colnago’s rich history of success, and this is yet another way for us to celebrate that legacy. Tadej Pogačar’s success, bringing us to our 28th UCI World Title, is a testament to the excellence of Colnago bikes. Now, riders can experience the same bike with the World Champion colors, designed to perform at the highest level.”

Colnago CEO Nicola Rosin

Where to Get Yours

The V4Rs and Y1Rs in World Champion livery will be available through authorized Colnago retailers. If you’ve ever dreamed of riding in rainbow stripes (without winning them outright), now’s your chance.

Colnago.com
